overview: A prequel to the critically acclaimed series featuring Jerri Blank, a 46 year-old ex-junkie, ex-con who returns to high school in a bid to start her life over.
tagline: Going to high school for the first time is always scary... Especially the second time around.
cast: Amy Sedaris|Stephen Colbert|Paul Dinello|Greg Hollimon|Philip Seymour Hoffman
